text: “(obagen) kavurun jibrīlṭa saturekuda?”yi (nabiyē! oba yudevvangen) vimasanu. niyata vaśayenma ohu allāhgē niyōgayan anuvama obagē sithi meya dæḍi lesa tæbuvēya. (meya) tamanṭa pera æti (dharmayan) satyaya karannak vaśayenda, ṛju mārgaya dænum dennak vaśayenda, viśvāsavantayinṭa śubhāraṁciyak vaśayenda ættēya
